name: @virtuous/redux-web-worker
description: Moves the redux reducer logic into Web Worker.
author: Florian MÃ¼ller <florian.mueller81@gmx.de> (https://github.com/devbucket)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && BABEL_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist --no-comments
scripts.postrelease: git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.postrelease:beta: git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access=public --tag=beta
